paragraphs: We prioritize our partners and clients in everything we do, focusing on meeting their needs by providing the finest tools, equipment, and devices from top global companies. We are committed to delivering post-sale services, including installation and warranty, to all our partners across the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Our experienced staff, with their extensive expertise and high skills, work diligently to ensure the provision of our services to you at the highest standards.

productList.title: La Marzocco KB90
description: The KB90 espresso machine from La Marzocco is the ultimate improvement to the Linea PB espresso machine.
Designed to increase the speed and ease of operation for baristas in busy cafes.
LED lights directed on the head and portafilter.

productList.title: LA Marzocco Strada AV 2 GROUPS
description: This machine features a splendid Italian design and an easy-to-use interface.
Programming feature to specify the quantity of the beverage.
Three exposed brewing groups.

productList.title: LA Marzocco GB5 X 3GROUP
description: The machine comes with a durable stainless steel frame.
Can be connected to the La Marzocco app.
Equipped with programmable buttons for controlling espresso shot volume.

productList.title: (SOTTO BANCO)
description: Sotto Banco is an elegant under-counter espresso machine.
Features stylish raised groups extending from the counter.
Aid with both service boiler and equipment presence.

productList.title: Rocket Espresso R9V
description: Rocket Espresso R9V is one of the best espresso machines from Rocket Espresso.
Includes features such as a 1.9-liter capacity boiler and PID temperature control.
Comes with a controllable magnetic pump and offers multiple options.

productList.title: RE Dobia
description: The Rocket Espresso RE Dobia combines the latest technologies used in Rocket Espresso.
Automatic programming for coffee shots.
PID temperature control (Proportional-Integral-Derivative).

productList.title: LA Marzocco GB5 X 3GROUP
description: La Marzocco's engineering team provides the latest technologies translated into the stylish GS3 MP home espresso machine.
It features the stability thermal system used in La Marzocco Strada,
as well as a cone valve system for gradual control of water flow and pressure.

productList.title: LA Marzocco gs3 AV 2 GROUPS
description: La Marzocco's engineering team provides the latest technologies translated into the stylish GS3 AV home espresso machine.
The boilers are thermally insulated to save energy and ensure thermal stability.
Can be directly connected to a water source.

productList.title: ROCKET APPARTAMENTO
description: Rocket Espresso Appartamento is a compact professional coffee machine made by Rocket Espresso.
Choose the color of the side panels to match your coffee setup angle.
Comes with classic features like mechanical pre-infusion and a heated group head, making it a professional device.

productList.title: Rocket R58 V3
description: The Rocket R58 is one of the most famous espresso machines known for its quality and performance.
The new R58 espresso maker from Rocket is handcrafted from the finest materials.
No need to worry about filling the tank again as the R58 features a unique rotary pump.

productList.title: Rocket R9 ONE
description: The best home coffee maker from Rocket Espresso, incomparable to any home coffee machine.
The R NINE ONE espresso machine from Rocket, despite its home design, incorporates all the features and technologies used in Rocket commercial machines.
Machine functions are controlled via a touchscreen, including the new automatic start/stop function.

productList.title: MAHLKONIG E80 SUPREME
description: The E80 Supreme grinder is designed for optimal extraction, featuring special 80mm steel burrs and a unique tooth design.
It comes with a high-strength bean hopper weighing 1800 grams and finger protection for user safety.
It performs rapid grinding at a rate of 6-7 grams per second, saving valuable time for baristas.
It includes an active cooling system to control internal temperature and reduce thermal expansion.

productList.title: MAHLKONIG E65 GBW
description: The distance selection function (DDD) allows precise adjustment of fineness based on the actual distance between the blades.
High-quality hardened steel blades, size 65mm, offer excellent grain grinding performance.
The robust grain hopper with finger protection ensures user safety and features a 1200-gram capacity and smart clamp.

productList.title: Mahlkonig EK 43S
description: The Mahlkonig EK 43S coffee grinder is an essential tool in the coffee world, providing precise and versatile grinding for high-quality coffee preparation.
It features a high grinding capacity and large blades to improve temperature and ensure grinding uniformity.
Additionally, it has flat blades that facilitate adjustment of settings.

productList.title: Anfim SP II
description: The SP-II espresso grinder is designed for intensive use with easy operation, allowing one-step grinding with custom titanium-coated discs and a double fan for temperature and noise control.
It provides easy grind adjustment, user-friendly programming, and precise timer.

productList.title: F83 XGi PRO
description: Fiorenzato's PRO technology for grinders is a distinctive innovation that allows easy cleaning and maintenance by separating the grinding chamber.
It enables access to the burrs and replacement without losing grinding settings, making maintenance effortless for baristas.
The EVO technology includes a cooling system to monitor motor heat, protecting coffee beans and ensuring flavor preservation.
M340 flat blades with a diameter of 83mm are precisely produced using digital computer control, making them corrosion-resistant and easy to polish.

productList.title: Single Dose
description: Mignon Single Dose Hopper is designed for easy coffee grinding.
High-performance AC motor and high productivity.
Easy operation and silent grinding technology with efficient results.
Precision grinding and made in Italy to the highest quality standards.

productList.title: Eureka Helios 75
description: Helios 75 sets a new standard in the professional coffee grinder world with 75mm blades and a 920W motor.
Comes with an intuitive touch screen and multiple timer settings.
The hopper sensor automatically closes the grinder when removing the hopper and resumes operation when placed correctly.
Comes with a two-year warranty from Espresso Station.

productList.title: Quamar Sirio Q
description: Category: Luxury Coffee Grinder
The Sirio-Q coffee grinder offers a revolutionary approach to coffee grinding, designed for baristas looking for a perfectly balanced and uniquely flavored coffee.
Years of continuous research and improvement have revealed new methods, techniques, and standards, emphasizing the importance of particle size and uniformity in ground coffee.

productList.title: Quamar T48e Grinder
description: The T48E coffee grinder comes with electronic settings and an easy-to-use screen. With flat blades with a diameter of 83mm, it produces up to 8 kilograms of ground coffee per day, making it ideal for cafes and roasteries that consume large quantities daily.

The grinder enables electronic adjustment of quantities and comes with counters for dosing collection and precise adjustment of the grinding process. It can be equipped with various optional accessories, and there are eight color options available.

productList.title: Baratza Sette 270Wi
description: Baratza Sette 270 grinder offers 270 grind settings.
It features a highly efficient motor that maintains the coffee's coolness.
It comes with a digital screen and three programmable buttons.

productList.title: IRHEA SF
description: IRHEA takes ground coffee, measures weight, controls water temperature, and time in automation for drip coffee preparation.
Compact size and high production capacity, extremely small and portable, installable at any angle, and expandable without limits.
Consistent brewing quality, consistent coffee taste regardless of operator experience or skills.

productList.title: IRHEA M3
description: Extraction at different temperatures for each group.
Temperature control for each step of the extraction process.
Ability to use all groups simultaneously.
Independent extraction in each group at the same time.

productList.title: IRHEA M5
description: Each group in iRhea is equipped with an LCD screen.
The user grinds the coffee and places it in the device, then selects the preferred brewing recipe.
Water temperature is automatically adjusted according to the specified recipe to start the process.
Extraction is automatically controlled by measuring the weight of the extract.

productList.title: CBS-2141XTS
description: Sturdy and easy-to-clean structure made of stainless steel.
Production capacity: Up to 3.9 gallons per hour.
Hot water tank capacity: 3.3 gallons.
Operates with Extractor® Touchscreen (ETOS) operating system.
Revolutionary Cascading Spray Dome (CSD) resistant to lime buildup in the spray head.

productList.title: BWT BESTAQUA 14 ROC COFFEE
description: Effective improvement for water optimization in coffee and espresso preparation.
Consistent water for coffee that can be replicated worldwide.
A universal solution for all typical raw water requirements and high water standards.
The coffee machine is completely safe against deposits such as lime and gypsum.

productList.title: Ice Maker
description: Self-contained
• Detachable
• Dispenser
• Snowflake ice mode
• Storage box

productList.title: ROSSELLA XFT193
description: Dimensions: 600 × 400 mm. Simple and practical design with humidity and temperature control. The oven is ideal for bakeries and pastry shops, with performance similar to large ovens.
The oven stands out for its simplicity, perfection, uniform heat distribution, and food coloring thanks to advanced heat management techniques.

productList.title: ARIANNA XFT133
description: The oven offers variable temperatures from 30 to 260 degrees Celsius.
Simple and perfect in design and high quality. Dimensions: 600x655x509H mm, Weight: 31 kg, Power: 3 kW.

productList.title: STEFANIA XFT113
description: Professional LINEMISS™ oven line targeting high productivity seekers.
The excellent STEFANIA XFT113 oven competes with large ovens, offering moisture removal and flexibility in heat management.

productList.title: Blendtec Stealth 885
description: 42 pre-programmed blending cycles
Advanced sound enclosure operates the blender with less noise.
Comes with two FourSide type jars.
200-sized illuminated OLED screen with a touch keypad.
